title: Why cant i earn Blue essence/IP after a game
body: I cant get any Ip/BE after any of my games anymore

replies.body: BE is not currently offered post game like IP was, but they can still be earned by other means like leveling, honor, mastery chests, and first win of the day missions.  [Cactopus also made a post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/BQed8FWz-leveling-and-rewards-improvements-to-milestone-emotes-capsules-fwotd) recently offering more details if you'd like to add to the discussion!
